CustomField.formula:
IF(
AND(
!ISBLANK(CallObject),
text(CallType)="Outbound"
),
"Outbound Call",
"")
+
IF(
AND(
!ISBLANK(CallObject),
text(CallType)="Inbound"
),
"Inbound Call",
"")
+
IF(
AND(
text(eMailDirection__c)="Inbound",
IsVoicemail__c = FALSE ,
IsMaison__c = FALSE ),
"Inbound Email Client",
"")
+
IF(
AND(
text(eMailDirection__c)="Inbound",
IsVoicemail__c,
!IsMaison__c),
"Inbound Call Voicemail",
"")
+
IF(
AND(
text(eMailDirection__c)="Inbound",
IsMaison__c),
"Inbound Email Maison",
"")
+
IF(
AND(
isAutoResponse__c = FALSE ,
text(eMailDirection__c)="Outbound",
IsMaison__c = FALSE),
"Outbound Email Client",
"")
+
IF(
AND(
!isAutoResponse__c,
text(eMailDirection__c)="Outbound",
IsMaison__c),
"Outbound Email Maison",
"")
+IF(
AND(
isAutoResponse__c,
text(eMailDirection__c)="Outbound"),
"Outbound Email AutoResponse",
"")
CustomField.label: Interaction
